p.6: Software engineers at Incedo develop the next-generation data-science technologies that impact Fortune 20 customers. Our products need to manage information on a massive scale, so we're always looking for engineers who bring fresh ideas from all areas=E2=80=94 distributed computing, large-scale system design, data storage, and UI design. Our engineers are versatile, are leaders, and are enthusiastic about taking on new problems across the full stack. Does this sound like you? As an Associate Software Engineer, you will work on a specific project critical to Incedo=E2=80=99s needs with opportunities to switch teams and projects as you and our fast-paced business grow and evolve.
p.8: =C2=B7 Perform Exploratory Data Analysis, test hypotheses, and generate insights as part of the analytical solution being built.
p.9: =C2=B7 Participate in solution approach and methodology design for the project/workstream
p.10: =C2=B7 Be an integral part of the team performing feature engineering, model building, model evaluation, and deployment
p.12: =C2=B7 Masters=E2=80=99 Degree in Applied Mathematics, Computer Science, Statistics, Business Analytics, Data Science, or related areas.
p.13: =C2=B7 Good working knowledge of common data science toolkits, such as Python/R and SQL based query languages
p.14: =C2=B7 Has worked on multiple projects involving Machine Learning/Data Science
p.15: =C2=B7 A good grasp of at least 2-3 Machine Learning Concepts such as Linear Regressions, Logistic Regression, Decision Tree, SVM, Random Forests, KNN, K-Means, Recommendation systems etc. along with the math behind some of the techniques
p.16: =C2=B7 Ability to articulate problem statements to formulate data science or analytics approaches
p.17: =C2=B7 Ability to communicate thought processes clearly
p.18: =C2=B7 0-1 years of prior work experience in Data and Analytics domains like IT Services, Consulting, Corporate etc.
